data.name: Faye Falling
data.detailed_description:
Explore purgatory as you discover who you are and how you died, in this heartfelt turn-based RPG.

  • You awaken in a decaying world, with no memories of how you got there. After a chance encounter with a powerful entity, you begin an epic journey to defeat an army of dark spirits, and corrupt gods.
  • Choose your class, skills, equipment, and more, for a unique gameplay path leading to multiple different endings.

  • Engage in fun, fast turn-based battles against a large variety of enemies.
  • EVADE enemy attacks by dodging left to right in quick, snappy minigames.
  • Cast powerful spells to inflict your opponents with devastating damage and ailments. Players can also take a more strategic approach by buffing their stats, summoning magical barriers, and much more.

  • Explore a diverse, ethereal world, filled with minigames, puzzles, secrets, and lost spirits spouting melancholy musings.
  • Complete optional side quests to receive rare items and gear.

  • Unlock a New Game+ mode with increased difficulty, and additional lore.
  • Beating New Game+ will unlock an exclusive ending, and an even greater challenge...

Faye Falling is an artful, emotional gameplay experience that explores death, mental illness, and hope. It was made entirely by one person; me!

data.short_description: Explore purgatory as you discover who you are and how you died, in this heartfelt RPG.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
